cofh.lib.item

Interface IAugmentableItem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockItemAugmentable, BlockItemEnergyCell, BlockItemFluidCell, EnergyContainerItemAugmentable, FluidContainerItemAugmentable, FluidReservoirItem, PotionInfuserItem, PotionQuiverItem, RFCapacitorItem, RFDrillItem, RFMagnetItem, RFPumpItem, RFSawItem, WateringCanItem

    public interface IAugmentableItem
    A reasonably freeform interface used for handling Augmentation for ItemStack objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> getAugments(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable) 
      int getAugmentSlots(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable) 
      default void setAugments(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable, java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> augments)
      Writes the augments TO the ItemStack's NBT and performs any extra logic which may be required.
      default void updateAugmentState(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable, java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> augments)
      Callback for items which may require parsing of the augments into a Properties list or some such.
      boolean validAugment(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable, net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augment, java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> augments)
      Check to see if augment *can* be installed.

    • Method Detail

      • getAugments

        default java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> getAugments(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable)

      • getAugmentSlots

        int getAugmentSlots(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable)
        Parameters:
        augmentable - Stack representing the Augmentable item.
        Returns:
        The *total* number of slots available for augmentation.

      • validAugment

        boolean validAugment(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable,
                     net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augment,
                     java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> augments)
        Check to see if augment *can* be installed. This is the validator check for the augment slot in a GUI.
        Parameters:
        augmentable - Stack representing the Augmentable item.
        augment - Stack representing the Augment item to be added.
        augments - List of ItemStacks representing existing augments.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the augment is compatible.

      • setAugments

        default void setAugments(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable,
                         java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> augments)
        Writes the augments TO the ItemStack's NBT and performs any extra logic which may be required.
        Parameters:
        augmentable - Stack representing the Augmentable item.
        augments - List of ItemStacks representing the Augments.

      • updateAugmentState

        default void updateAugmentState(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack augmentable,
                                java.util.List<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> augments)
        Callback for items which may require parsing of the augments into a Properties list or some such. :)
        Parameters:
        augmentable - Stack representing the Augmentable item.
        augments - List of ItemStacks representing the Augments.
